fail_message: Life fails to take hold in this place.

terrain.message: Plant life grows wild over the ground.
The ground shifts and crumbles, grass growing from the cracks.

fail_message: Nothing remains to be marked by flame.

terrain.//: Reliable fungus killer, but you're not getting your terrain back.
terrain.message: The fungal corruption erupts into a shower of blue embers!

furniture.message: The egg sacks swell and burst from the unearthly heat!
The fungal corruption erupts into a shower of blue embers!

furniture.//: Partial effect on mi-go terraforming, only the more recognizably alive projections are vulnerable.
furniture.message: The unnatural outgrowths are cauterized bare, in a spray of green sparks!

fail_message: The ground weathers the blast unscathed.
The barrier flickers out of existence.
Reality fails to impose itself on this place.
